x.description: The amount of velocity to add on the x-axis.
x.markdownDescription: The amount of velocity to add on the x-axis.

y.description: The amount of velocity to add on the y-axis.
y.markdownDescription: The amount of velocity to add on the y-axis.

z.description: The amount of velocity to add on the z-axis.
z.markdownDescription: The amount of velocity to add on the z-axis.

horizontal_modifier.description: If set, a modifier to apply to the horizontal velocity of this actio prior to adding the velocity of the entity.
horizontal_modifier.markdownDescription: If set, a modifier to apply to the horizontal velocity of this actio prior to adding the velocity of the entity.

horizontal_modifiers.description: If set, modifiers to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity..
horizontal_modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, modifiers to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity..

vertical_modifier.description: If set, a modifier to apply to the vertical velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity.
vertical_modifier.markdownDescription: If set, a modifier to apply to the vertical velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity.

vertical_modifiers.description: If set, modifiers to apply to the vertical velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity.
vertical_modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, modifiers to apply to the vertical velocity of this action prior to adding the velocity of the entity.

horizontal_post_modifier.description: If set, a modifier to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.
horizontal_post_modifier.markdownDescription: If set, a modifier to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.

horizontal_post_modifiers.description: If set, modifiers to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity..
horizontal_post_modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, modifiers to apply to the horizontal velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity..

vertical_post_modifier.description: If set, a modifier to apply to the vertical velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.
vertical_post_modifier.markdownDescription: If set, a modifier to apply to the vertical velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.

vertical_post_modifiers.description: If set, modifiers to apply to the vertical velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.
vertical_post_modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, modifiers to apply to the vertical velocity of this action after adding the velocity of the entity.

space.description: The space to perform the addition/setting of velocity in.
space.markdownDescription: The space to perform the addition/setting of velocity in.

client.description: If this is false, the action will not execute on the client.
client.markdownDescription: If this is false, the action will not execute on the client.

server.description: If this is false, the action will not execute on the server.
server.markdownDescription: If this is false, the action will not execute on the server.

set.description: If this is true, the action will act as a "set" velocity action, overriding the entity's current velocity instead of adding to it.
set.markdownDescription: If this is true, the action will act as a "set" velocity action, overriding the entity's current velocity instead of adding to it.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md)

Adds or sets velocity towards a specific direction and also allows you to modify said velocity using modifiers.

Type ID: `apugli:add_velocity`

!!! note

    If the entity action type behaves unexpectedly, try setting either the `client` (should always work) or `server` (might not work) boolean fields to `false`. [Here are some examples.](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/add_velocity)
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md)

Adds or sets velocity towards a specific direction and also allows you to modify said velocity using modifiers.

Type ID: `apugli:add_velocity`

!!! note

    If the entity action type behaves unexpectedly, try setting either the `client` (should always work) or `server` (might not work) boolean fields to `false`. [Here are some examples.](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/add_velocity)
